name: One Widget Countdown
author: www.f1widget.com

sections.description:
The world’s famous Formula 1 Countdown widget.

Always be prepared for the next race! Keep this one on your WordPress website to remind your visitors what they should never miss!

Shows countdown to the next F1 race. Always up to date. Original code by Radu Galesanu.
sections.installation:
1. Upload f1widget.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. From the ‘Appearance > Widgets’ menu, drag the ‘Formula 1 Countdown Widget’ to the desired sidebar
sections.changelog:
2.0

  • Replaced Flash implementation with modern HTML5 implementation
  • Replaced legacy widget with modern version adhering to WordPress standards
  • Added support for Español, Italiano, Deutsch, Français

1.1

  • Added support for MotoGP

1.0

  • The One Widget Countdown is now available as a WordPress plugin

short_description: Shows countdown to the next F1 race. Always up to date.
